let's get into the economic collapse

retail fall apart in other parts of the

we're seeing it out in the UK and we can
see that consumers out there well
they're spending less at the shops and
last month well it looks like because of

that well May sales they're not doing

dropped by 4.4 percent this is the

the survey also found that out online

slowest pace since December of 2012
now shoppers spent about 4.3 percent

we discussed this in many many reports
online sales are a small fraction of

we put them together consumers spent
0.4% less in May which shows you that
well they didn't take their funds and go
to online
because those combined that number is

there's inflation and right now the

actually what we're seeing with teenage

they're having actually a very difficult

they're getting 0% interest rates on

it's getting very difficult for these

and a lot of them don't want to risk

something I'm going to stay out of it

I can't lose it all in the market and

it's becoming even harder for these

they're also going for the part-time

mind because they can't find the

usually when we see this type of signal
it's right before a stock market peak
now as you can see we are now at levels
that have usually occurred just before

and both of these times investors
believe that stocks could never go down
and we've heard this before we heard

we're in debt like we've never seen

because there's no doubt that the
Chinese citizens believe the you want is

instead of the

make sure that you have cash on hand
make sure you have gold and silver if

make sure you have food make sure you

and you're going to keep your kryptos
you're going to keep your gold and

use that first use your water use your

because we're going to go through this

prepared you'll be able to weather the

coming in and someone was sitting there

to get batteries I'm not going to get

not going to do any of these things I'm

what happens will those people after

generator
there's no food there's no batteries
they're sitting in the dark wondering

why on the other hand that person knew

someone tries to break in I have a

okay
